• Conducted a proof of concept to determine the feasibility and process of upgrading existing pipelines reliant on Spark to a newer version.
  • Implemented Cron-based scheduling for ETL job orchestration solution for Amazons Adsâ€™ Supply Quality which hosts 8k+ jobs with 50k+ job instances and processes 20PB of data daily. Also implemented a Dependency Validation solution for the cron-based scheduling. Deployed the features to production.

• Created an immersive virtual experience to showcase rooms in real estate properties to facilitate remote viewing and decision-making for potential buyers.
